00013 class PictureInPicture: public Filter {
00014 
00015     public:
00016         PictureInPicture(Scribbler& rob): rob(rob) {}
00017         ~PictureInPicture(){}
00018 
00019         virtual void filter(Picture* image) {
00020             PicturePtr colorImage = rob.takePicture("jpeg");
00021 
00022             int height = image->getHeight();
00023             int width = image->getWidth();
00024             int reduction = 4;
00025 
00026             int reduced_height = height/reduction;
00027             int reduced_width = width/reduction;
00028 
00029 
00030             for(int h = 0; h < reduced_height; h++) {
00031                 for(int w = 0; w < reduced_width; w++) {
00032                     image->setPixel((width-reduced_width)+w,h,
00033                             colorImage->getPixel(reduction*w,reduction*h));
00034                 }
00035             }
00036 
00037         }
00038 
00039     protected:
00040         Scribbler& rob;
00041 
00042 };
00043

00051         this->location = location;

00054     }
00055

00078 int main(int argc, char ** argv) {
00079 
00080     int enablePnp = 0;
00081     int enableRecord = 0;
00082 
00083     int check_index = 1;
00084     int path_index = -1;
00085     int file_name_index = -1;
00086 
00087     if(argc > 1) {
00088         if(!strcmp(argv[1], "record")) { 
00089             enableRecord = 1;
00090             check_index += 3;
00091             path_index = 2;
00092             file_name_index = 3;
00093         }
00094         else if(!strcmp(argv[1], "pnp")) {
00095             enablePnp = 1;
00096             check_index++;
00097         }
00098         else if(strcmp(argv[1], "none"))
00099             fprintf(stderr, "Invalid Filter Opition\n");
00100         if(argc > check_index) {
00101             if(!strcmp(argv[check_index], "record")) {
00102                 enableRecord = 1;
00103                 check_index += 3;
00104                 path_index = check_index - 2;
00105                 file_name_index = check_index - 1;
00106             }
00107             else if(!strcmp(argv[check_index], "pnp")) {
00108                 enablePnp = 1;
00109                 check_index++;
00110             }
00111             else if(strcmp(argv[check_index], "none"))
00112                 fprintf(stderr, "Invalid Filter Opition\n");
00113         }
00114     }
00115     else if(argc < 2) {
00116         fprintf(stderr, "Usuage: ./test_blob pnp|record path filename|none\n");
00117         return -1;
00118     }
00119     
00120     if(argc < check_index) {
00121         fprintf(stderr, 
00122                 "Usuage: ./test_blob pnp|record path filename|none\n");
00123         return -1;
00124     }
00125 
00126     connect();
00127 
00128     cout << "Connected to Robot\n";
00129     cout << "Proceeding to Train Blob\n";
00130 
00131     int mid_w = 256/2;
00132     int mid_h = 192/2;
00133 
00134     int x1 = mid_w - 10;
00135     int y1 = mid_h - 10;
00136     int x2 = mid_w + 10;
00137     int y2 = mid_h + 10;
00138 
00139     Pixel red = {255,0,0};
00140 
00141     int train = 0;
00142     string toTrain;
00143 
00144     PicturePtr showpic = robot.takePicture();
00145     PicturePtr trainpic = showpic->clone();
00146     while(!train) {
00147         for(int h = y1; h < y2; h++) {
00148             for(int w = x1; w < x2; w++) {
00149                 showpic->setPixel(w,h,red);
00150             }
00151         }
00152         cout << "Use this image to train?" << endl;
00153         if(fork() == 0) {
00154             showpic->show();
00155             exit(0);
00156         }
00157         cin >> toTrain;
00158         if(toTrain == "y" || toTrain == "yes")
00159             train = 1;
00160     }
00161     robot.conf_rle_range(trainpic->getRawImage(), x1, y1, x2, y2);
00162 
00163     cout << "Proceeding to Test Blob Tracking\n";
00164 
00165     PictureInPicture * pnp;
00166     //Record * record;
00167     VideoStream foo(robot, 2);
00168 
00169     if(enablePnp) { 
00170         pnp = new PictureInPicture(robot);
00171         foo.addFilter(pnp);
00172     }
00173     /*
00174     if(enableRecord) {

00176                 256,192,1);
00177         foo.addFilter(record);
00178     }
00179     */
00180     foo.startStream();
00181 
00182     int close = 0;
00183     string done;
00184     while(!close) {
00185         cout << "Enter E or Exit to quit\n";
00186         cin >> done;
00187         if(done == "E" || done == "Exit" || done == "e" || done == "exit")
00188             close = 1;
00189     }
00190
